channel.title: How to add ::pnpc
channel.description: could somebody make or give me a link to a guide on how to make a working ::pnpc command please? (This is for my 317 server)

item.title: How to add ::pnpc
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

In Commands.java

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pnpc")) { int npc = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(5)); if (npc < 9999) { c.npcId2 = npc; c.isNpc = true; c.getPA().requestUpdates(); } }

Read full topic

item.title: How to add ::pnpc
item.dc:creator: @Arcane_Mage Arcane Mage
item.description:
@Arcane_Mage wrote:

the server is a sourced [pi], that wont work

Read full topic

item.title: How to add ::pnpc
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Arcane Mage:

could somebody make or give me a link to a guide on how to make a working ::pnpc command please? (This is for my 317 server)

if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 2) { int npc = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); if (npc < 2745) { npcId = npc; npcId2 = npc; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } if (command.startsWith("unpc") && playerRights >= 2) { isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
Add those two commands in you client.java server sided.

Read full topic
